unnormalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming Services Hit Desi Note, Mostly in B Flat
normalised: entertainment news: music streaming services hit desi note, mostly in b flat

unnormalised: Mumbai, October 26th – Is your grandma grooving to Badshah instead of bhajans? Blame (or thank) the rise of music streaming! New reports indicate a 420% increase in bhajans streamed via Spotify in the last year, probably because she accidentally clicked the wrong playlist.
normalised: mumbai, october twenty sixth – is your grandma grooving to badshah instead of bhajans? blame or thank the rise of music streaming! new reports indicate a four hundred and twenty percent increase in bhajans streamed via spotify in the last year, probably because she accidentally clicked the wrong playlist.

unnormalised: Researchers from IIT-Bombay (who should probably be focusing on, you know, actual science) claim the average Indian now spends more time choosing a song than choosing a chaiwala.
normalised: researchers from I I T-bombay who should probably be focusing on, you know, actual science claim the average indian now spends more time choosing a song than choosing a chaiwala.

unnormalised: Industry insider, Priya Sharma, says, “Forget 'DDLJ', streaming is the *real* romance for Gen Z. They'd rather share a Spotify Wrapped than a plate of golgappe.”
normalised: industry insider, priya sharma, says, “forget 'D D L J', streaming is the *real* romance for gen Z. they'd rather share a spotify wrapped than a plate of golgappe.”

unnormalised: Meanwhile, local musicians are celebrating... or crying, depending on how many 'R's they're getting in royalties. Rumors are circulating of a protest planned by tabla players, demanding equal representation in algorithm-generated playlists. They’re threatening to march 10 km, banging their tablas all the way!
normalised: meanwhile, local musicians are celebrating... or crying, depending on how many 'R's they're getting in royalties. rumors are circulating of a protest planned by tabla players, demanding equal representation in algorithm-generated playlists. they’re threatening to march ten kilometer, banging their tablas all the way!

unnormalised: One user lamented, "I just want to listen to Lata Mangeshkar without getting bombarded by remix suggestions! Is that too much to ask, ya?" The struggle is real.
normalised: one user lamented, "i just want to listen to lata mangeshkar without getting bombarded by remix suggestions! is that too much to ask, ya?" the struggle is real.
